title: More than 1,400 dolphins killed in Faroe Islands hunt, stirring fresh anger over old tradition
content:
1. More than 1,400 dolphins killed in Faroe Islands hunt, stirring fresh anger over old tradition  NBC News
  2. 1500 dolphins mass slaughtered in largest single cull on Faroe Islands  The Independent
  3. Over 1,400 dolphins killed in Faroe Islands hunt  Yahoo News
  4. Dolphins SLAUGHTERED During Annual Tradition  On Demand News
  5. Footage shows a sea of blood after close to 1,500 dolphins were killed in a traditional mass hunt in the Faroe Islands  msnNOW
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
